sources.title: Hands Of A Stranger
sources.description: A concert pianist loses his hands in an accident and a surgeon replaces them with the hands of a corpse. Weird things begin to happen.

sources.title: Hands Of A Stranger
sources.description: [1962]starring Paul Lukather ,James Stapleton A concert pianist loses his hands in a car crash, but a surgeon gives him new ones. The experimental medical procedure goes awry when the new hands drive the pianist mad.

sources.title: Hands of a Stranger (1962)
sources.description: A concert pianist loses his hands in a car crash, but a surgeon gives him new ones. The experimental medical procedure goes awry when the new hands drive the pianist mad. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/hands-of-a-stranger-1962/

sources.title: Hands of a Stranger (1962) SUSPENSE
sources.description:
Stars: Paul Lukather, Joan Harvey, James Noah
Writer/Director: Newt Arnold

After a concert pianist loses his hands in a car crash, a surgeon grafts on a pair of a murderer that appear to have a mind of their own! Loosely based on the novel The Hands of Orlac. Watch for a young Sally Kellerman.

metadata.Plot: A surgeon must graft new hands on a concert pianist to replace his badly mangled ones. However, after the operation, the pianist comes to believe that his new hands have a mind of their own, and are trying to force him to commit evil acts.
metadata.Actors: Paul Lukather, Joan Harvey, James Noah
